In John 13:27 “Satan entered into him” because Judas opened the door to Satan. He had been stealing money from the bag secretly, and going to the enemy of Jesus in secret and yet eat, din, walk, drink and sat with Jesus. Then sat down at our Lord’s table with known sins he would not confess.

Unconfessed and unforsaken sin always opens the door to Satan’s power. Satan doesn’t gain a foothold in the lives of people who are walking in the light with Jesus. He only gains access when we open the door.

So the question that faces every one of us now is how do we keep from just being “numbered”? The sad reality is that after you have been at it a while, there is an awareness that there have been people who sat in the church, and maybe even on the same pew where you are sitting that were nothing more than just “numbered” among us but absent.

1. Numbered but absent.

2. Numbered but aloof.

3. Numbered but distant.

4. Numbered but not committed.

5. Numbered but not restrained.

6. Numbered but never discipled.

7. Numbered but never taught.

8. Numbered but unconsecrated.

I dare say that I am preaching to some today who are only “numbered” among us and given a year or two or more years. . . you will manifest. How do we keep from being in that category? 2 Timothy 4:5 KJV “But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, . . . make full proof of thy ministry”.

a. Make sure you are converted. . .

b. Make sure you are filled with the Holy Ghost. . .

c. Make sure you are striving to live a holy life.

d. Take heed to yourself and your thought life and make sure it is crucified.

e. Get involved and stay involved. . .

f. Pursue a full spiritual life that pushes you toward a state of perpetual revival.

But Satan’s frailty is proved by this, that he cannot approach a soul unless that soul has first turned to him.

When you get close to Jesus, one of two things will happen: either you will become wholly his, or you will end up more alienated from him.

Among those who hate Christ the most, some once professed to trust him, His claims are so exclusive, and his demands so pervasive that, in the end, you must either give yourself to him completely or give him up altogether. There is no middle ground. For those who get close, the only outcomes are full devotion or eventual antagonism; and every day, each of us is heading in one direction or the other.

In an age when many are abandoning the faith they once professed, the story of Judas warns us to guard our hearts, lest we drift away. Not as a discouragement, but as a warning to us, how the greatest spiritual privileges may be neutralised by the indulgence of one illicit passion, and the life, which is lived in the face of the unclouded sun, may set at last in the night of despair.

The story of Judas also equips us to reach out to those who may be close to walking away from the faith. Christ calls us in Jude 1: 22–23 to “be merciful to those who doubt; save others by snatching them out of the fire”. Finally, the story of Judas reminds us that nothing good can come from giving up on Jesus Christ.

fields.title: BELIEVERS ARE HOUSE OF PRAYER
fields.word:
Kingdom life is sustained by kingdom principles, of which one of such principle is called prayers. You are expected to express your faith by the motion you set up in prayers. It is only by the act of prayer that covenant promises can be experienced and enjoyed.

Every true Christian living is considered as temple of God, the dwelling place of God’s power and influence. You are a house where God dwells by His Spirit. In Ephesians 2:22, the Bible says, “In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.”

Service and prayers are inexplicable covenant culture that manifests and establishes destiny and dominion. Complaint aggravates problems but prayer connects Jehovah Ropheka. If He healed the bitter waters by making them sweet, He can turn your bitterness to sweetness.

When you pray God causes what you have been busy searching and running around for to start searching and looking for you. He causes your ability to be connected to ability that will motivate it to relevance for manifestation and fulfillment.

The strength of Zion is prayers. They go from strength to strength each one who appears before God of Zion in prayer. Every prayer time is strength renewal and grace refreshing time…to read more go to www.siftersnews.com

fields.title: BREAKING THE INVISIBLE POWERS HOLDING YOU
fields.prayers:
Many Christians today are living a life of constant struggle and failure no matter what they do to try and improve their lot in life.
They are fighting something they do not understand. It is as if something invisible comes and blocks their progress just before they reach their goal.
Something keeps them from leading a life of victory and fruitfulness. This invisible barrier that seems to plague many Christians of good standing, is what this we are talking about today.
This barrier often leaves a person and it’s family members frustrated, confused, or in total despair.
In some families, this invisible barrier causes unemployment. Then we find that in that particular family almost everybody struggles with getting employment or each time they are employed, they lose their jobs.
This may happen even in cases where people are well educated. The paradox is that this phenomenon seems to affect both the Christians and the non-Christians within a family.
This invisible barrier is called a curse. Curses bring shame, embarrassment, frustration, and mockery.
God never intended for any of His children to live under a curse. That is why He sent His Son to become a curse for us. ""Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law by becoming a curse for us” ... ."(Galatians 3:13).
It is possible to break this invisible barrier through the power of the Cross of Calvary!
Anti-breakthrough decrees, be revoked, in the name of Jesus.
1.    Every power prolonging my stay in the wilderness, die, in the name of Jesus.
2.    I withdraw my name from the book of born for nothing, in the name of Jesus.
3.    Every bondage of circular spirit, break, in the name of Jesus.
4.    Every vehicle, machine and forces of stagnancy in my life, I destroy you today, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Every door of good things that has been closed in my life- hear the word of God in Isaiah 60;11 and be opened day and night in the name of Jesus.
6.    Foundation of backwardness and stagnation in my life I uproot you completely in the name of Jesus.
7.    Let every demonic reactions against my breakthrough and testimonies turn against them in the name of Jesus.
8.    Every challenge at the edge of my breakthrough or testimony, Oh God destroy them, in the mighty name of Jesus Christ.
9.    I cut off any connection which my life may have with the spirit of last minute failure, be it from the lineage of my father or mother, it is irrelevant, I cut it off and kill the agents with the edge of the sword , in the mighty name of Jesus.
10.    The spirit, curse, spell or whatever it is that is Seeing it or Hearing it, but not receiving is, be destroy by the blood of Jesus Christ, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
11.    Almost there, but never there, is it a curse, or spell, demon, foundation, evil life partner or whatever, I stand on the name and blood of Jesus Christ to break and shatter the you. in the mighty name of Jesus,
12.    I command every effect and consequences of strange money on my business to be neutralized and sources of income, in the name of Jesus.
13.    Let every evil pattern of satanic discipline in my life be terminated, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Jehovah destroy and bind the spiritual and virtue robbers, thieves, exchangers, subtutitators and transferres operating in my life, in Jesus name.
15.    Every spiritual and virtues killers, destroyers, spoilers, scavengers, wasters and defies, I destroy and bind you by the blood of Jesus Christ.
16.    Powers, curses, spells, embargoes, evil covenants and whatever it is whose work is to defy, demote, dwarf, fade away, depricates and deminishes me, my anointing, importance, blessings, destiny and any good and important thing in my life, I destroy and erase you all by the blood of Jesus Christ.
17.    The giants, robbers, thieves, scavengers and exchangers occupying and operating in any department of my life and life territory, Jehovah remove, destroy and bind them.
18.    Every stronghold of the enemy in my life, blood of Jesus Christ destroy and vanquish them forever.
19.    Whatever that is standing as an impediments or hills or mountains or walls or shut doors or shut gates or closed or shut roads or blockages against my talent, anointing, breakthrough, deliverance, healing, blessings, my appointed time and progress and greatness, Holy Ghost Thunder destroy, level and bind them forever.
20.    Every force or power or whatever it is, withholding me from manifesting, holding and occupying my blessings,  favor, position, kingship and crown, O God help me, remove, destroy and vanish them forever, in Jesus name.
21.    Every force or power or whatever it is standing and withholding me from becoming an advertisement of divine power, favor and grace, in Jesus name.
22.    The Sword of the Lord cut-down, kill and bury every power assigned to bury my breakthrough, blessings, appointed time, good health, answers to my prayers and the manifestations of my blessings and answered prayers.
23.    Every root and causes of reoccurring and repeated failures, shame and inability to have a breakthrough, success and stand on my God given position, Jehovah remove, destroy and cast them into the bottomless pit, in Jesus name.
24.    Every set up of the devil to make me not to serve God to the end of my life, for Gods promises for me and good prophecies not to come to pass or even delays it, Jehovah remove, destroy and delete forever, in Jesus name.
25.    Every spiritual wickedness that has prospered themselves in my life, I destroy and delete you by the blood of Jesus Christ.
26.    Every invincible hand, legs and powers or forces or persons working against me in any form or shape, bewitching me and limiting me, vanish forever in the name of Jesus.
27.    Every demonic policies of the enemy or from my family or people and gods of my fathers or mothers standing or working or limiting or restraining my blessings, favours or restraining me from greatness.
28.    I destroy you foundational, generational and ancestral powers, yokes and curses working against me and turns people heart against me, in the Jesus name.
29.    I destroy you forces that that causes me disorders in my progress and ministry, in Jesus name.
30.    You floods of problems in my life, I destroy and dry you to your root in Jesus name.
31.    Every foundational  and generational war against my rise, wealth, greatness, anointing and my ministry, I destroy and vanish you in Jesus name.

fields.title: OPPRESSION MUST DIE
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Exodus 14
Confession - Isaiah 54:14 
PRAYER POINTS:
1.    Every plantation of oppression in my life be uprooted by fire, in the name of Jesus.
2.    O God, arise and do something in my life today that will make my enemy cry, in the name of Jesus.
3.    Every seed of oppression, die, in the name of Jesus.
4.    Thou power of witchcraft oppression, die, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Holy Ghost fire, sanitize my body, in the name of Jesus.
6.    I fire back every arrow of oppression, in the name of Jesus.
7.    Every yoke of oppression, break, in the name of Jesus.
8.    O God, arise and let every power of oppression scatter, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Every weapon of oppression fashioned against me, die, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Any power that wants me to die in this condition, die, in the name of Jesus.
11.    Every yoke of stagnancy, break, in the name of Jesus.
12.    You blood-sucking power, die, in the name of Jesus.
13.    Every dream oppression, die, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Every inherited oppression, die, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Every evil power that pursued my parents and is now pursing me, die, in the name of Jesus.
16.    Every power that has vowed to destroy me, die now, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Within seven days, let all my stubborn pursuers be burned, in the name of Jesus.
18.    Arrows of affliction, backfire by fire, in the name of Jesus.
19.    Every yoke of the oppressor, break, in the name of Jesus.
20.    Every yoke of generational and foundational curse, break, in the name of Jesus.
21.    I sprinkle the blood of Jesus on my dreams, in the name of Jesus.
22.    I claim every good thing my dreams reveal, in the name of Jesus.
23.    I expel every evil power attached to my name, in the name of Jesus.
24.    Thou power of darkness representing, impersonating or bearing my name in the spirit realm die, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Every power delegated to project evil into my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
26.    Blood of Jesus, roar like thunder and pursue my pursuers, in the name of Jesus.
27.    Any strange thing and evil deposits in my body, be consumed by the fire of the Holy Ghost, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: KILLING THE SEED OF DARKNESS
fields.prayers:
PRAYER POINTS
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - 1Sam. 17
Confession - Matt. 15:13
 
1.    Evil shoes of my parents, I pull you out because you will not size my feet, in the name of Jesus.
2.    Any blind or deaf evil covenant, break, in the name of Jesus.
3.    I enter into the covenant of favour and good luck, in the name of Jesus.
4.    I command the anointing of success and fruitfulness to rest on me, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Every force of sweating without result, die, in the name of Jesus.
6.    You powers whose work is to create obstacles on my way and against my progress, vanish, in the name of Jesus.
7.    Power standing against my testimonies and breakthrough, be bind and be cast into the pit of darkness, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Any power assign against my favour and blessing, be banished, in the name of Jesus.
9.    You powers whose work is to despise me, I banish you forever, in the name of Jesus.
10.    You forces whose work is to build and establish evil in my life, I bind and cast you into the bottomless pit, in the name of Jesus.
11.    The Pharaoh of backwardness pursuing me, perish in the Red Sea, in the name of Jesus.
12.    Any witchcraft power posing as my husband/wife in my dream, be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
13.    Holy Ghost, purge my blood from satanic poison and injection, in the name of Jesus.
14.    O Lord, with Your power as Great Physician, come into my life now, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Every satanic banker managing anything that belongs me, die, in the name of Jesus.
16.    Every power manipulating my divine information, die, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Archives of darkness, release my beneficial information, in the name of Jesus.
18.    Ancestral secrets behind my problems, be revealed and erased be by fire, in the name of Jesus.
19.    Every bitter writing on my breakthroughs, die, in the name of Jesus.
20.    Every spiritual power, harassing me sexually, be smitten with blindness, in the name of Jesus.
21.    Every power of the wicked, prostrate and lick the dust, in the name of Jesus.
22.    Every power nominating me for termination or demotion, be disgraced, in Jesus’ name.
23.    All visible and invisible walls against my destiny, break, in the name of Jesus.
24.    I execute divine judgment against every demonic activity militating against my glory and destiny, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Every evil power delaying the manifestation of my appointed time and my destiny, die, in Jesus’ name.
26.    Every witchcraft incantation, divination or prayer targeted at my greatness, blessing and marriage, die, in the name of Jesus.
27.    My Father, cast forth lightening to scatter every enemy of my destiny, in Jesus’ name.
28.    Every satanic data base, network and intelligence working against my destiny, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
29.    O God of new beginnings, arise and promote me and give me grace, in the name of Jesus.
30.    O rod of God, arise and divide my Red Sea, in the name of Jesus.
31.    Every agenda of the power of the might and darkness against my destiny, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
32.    I fire back, every arrow of shame and backwardness, in the name of Jesus.
33.    I pull down every stronghold of satanic failure and delay, in the name of Jesus.
34.    O God, arise and let my appointed time and breakthroughs manifest, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: EVIL ARROW ASSIGNED BY DAY & NIGHT, BACKFIRE PRAYER POINTS
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading Psalm 118
Confession - Deut. 7:15
 
1.    Every evil against me, be judged today, in the name of Jesus.
2.    Every power assigned to put sorrows and ashes on my head, vanish, in the name of Jesus.
3.    Every evil throne reigning against me, be dethroned and scattered, in the name of Jesus.
4.    Every satanic agent assigned against me, be smitten, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Every power assigned to put me on the sick bed, be scatter and disgraced, in the name of Jesus.
6.    Every chariot of the enemy assigned against me, catch fire, in the name of Jesus.
7.    I break every-chain of slavery in my life, in the name of Jesus.
8.    I cast down evil powers and strongholds and set them on fire, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Every man contesting against the oil on my head, loose your power, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Arrows of the wicked, be diverted and backfire, in the name of Jesus.
11.    Covenant oil of God, fall upon me, in the name of Jesus.
12.    I lift away every garment of darkness, in the name of Jesus.
13.    Curses by night and day shall not stand, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Arrow of satanic judgment, backfire, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Everything the enemy has stolen by day or night, come back, in the name of Jesus.
16.    Arrows assigned by day, backfire, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Arrows assigned by night, backfire, in the name of Jesus.
18.    Arrows that stole from me, be broken by the power of God, in the name of Jesus.
19.    Every altar that has risen against me by day or night, break, in the name of Jesus.
20.    Incantations from witchcraft opposition, be clear away by thunder, in the name of Jesus.
21.    O God, arise and set the altars of the wicked on fire, in the name of Jesus.
22.    Every mouth of the wicked speaking against me shut up, in the name of Jesus.
23.    Every power stealing my promotion or increase, die, in the name of Jesus.
24.    Every abnormal pattern in my family, break away, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Every confusion and discouragement holding me captive, break away, in the name of Jesus.
26.    Ministry of fear and go slow in my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
27.    Let my portions come from heaven, in the name of Jesus.
28.    O Lord, show my soul mercy, in the name of Jesus.
29.    Strange spiritual garments, burn into ashes, in the name of Jesus.
30.    You tormenting-affliction, the Lord rebuke and cast you away, in the name of Jesus.
31.    Like the rising of the sun, O God of wonders, arise in my life, in the name of Jesus.
32.    The glory of my rising shall not diminish, in the name of Jesus.
33.    Power of God, consume every hindrance to my breakthroughs, in the name of Jesus.
34.    Stubborn yokes assigned to my life, break by fire, in the name of Jesus.
35.    Anxiety assigned to my life, fall away, in the name of Jesus.
36.    Evil burdens assigned to my life, fall away, in the name of Jesus.
37.    Divine power and restoration, arise and locate me, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: DEALING WITH THE POWERS OF THE NIGHT
fields.prayers:
PRAYER POINTS
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Psalm 27
Confessions - Psalm 125:3
Make these prayer confessions violently.
 
1.    The word of God concerning my life is settled in heaven.  
2.    I bind myself to the eternal word of God, in Jesus name.  
3.    I decree that any dream, word, vision, that did not originate from God are cancelled in my life, in Jesus name.  
4.    Every tree my heavenly Father has not planted, I uproot them, in the name of Jesus.
5.    I fire back, every spiritual bullet fired against me in my dreams, in Jesus name.
6.    I surround myself with the fire of God, in Jesus name.
7.    No power of darkness will have a way into my life again.
8.    My Father, let Your heavenly hosts and Your warriors, take over my battles, in Jesus name.  
9.    Oh Lord of hosts, arise and fight for me, in Jesus name.
10.    I arise and put on the whole armor of God and I resist every power of darkness, in Jesus name.  
11.    Every power assigned to manipulate my life, I crush you, in the name of Jesus.  
12.    Every evil spirit that has attacked me in my dream, I command you to be disgraced, in the name of Jesus.
13.    By the power in the blood of Jesus, you powers that have conquered me, I overthrown and reconquer you, in Jesus name.
14.    You powers that have victory over me, I revoke your victory, overthrown.
15.    I renounce every conscious and unconscious familiar spirit and I reject and break your covenant, in the name of Jesus.
16.    You the spirit of grave and death, be scattered, in the name of Jesus.
17.    I cancel every curse of untimely death sent against me, in the name of Jesus.
18.    I refuse to die before my time, in the name of Jesus.
19.    I plead the blood of Jesus over my body, soul and spirit and neutralize every satanic poison deposited in my life.
20.    Sickness, pain and weakness, get out of my system, in the name of Jesus.
21.    Every disease, planted into my body, through dreams, get out, in the name of Jesus.
22.    Every effort of the enemy to weaken my prayer life, die, in the name of Jesus.
23.    I cancel every dream of hopelessness, in the name of Jesus.
24.    I banish every senseless and meaningless dream, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Negative dreams shall not come to past in my life, in the name of Jesus.
26.    You spiritual cannibals, vomit my blood and flesh now, in the name of Jesus.
27.    You evil night workers, I crush your powers, in the name of Jesus.
28.    Every spirit that has been oppressing me in my dreams, I declare my house and room danger zones for you, in Jesus’ name.
29.    You the powers of the night, I command the power of God to pursue you, in the name of Jesus.
30.    You the powers of the night, I command the sword of the Lord to slay you, in the name of Jesus.
31.    Every evil power of the ministers of the night, be dismantled, in the name of Jesus.
32.    Every cord of the powers of the night, be broken, in the name of Jesus.
33.    Every snare of the powers of the night, be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
34.    Every evil control of the powers of the night, be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
35.    Every evil bondage of the powers of the night, break, in the name of Jesus.
36.    Let every work of the powers of the night be exposed and brought to the light, in the name of Jesus.
37.    Thou evil powers of the night, be humbled and disgraced, in the name of Jesus.
38.    Let the evil throne of the powers of the night be dismantled by the thunder power of God, in the name of Jesus.
39.    Every magical operation of the night, be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
40.    Every enchantment and witchcraft powers of the night, die, in the name of Jesus.
41.    I heap shame and vengeance of the Lord upon every evil power of the night, in the name of Jesus.
42.    All curses of the evil powers of the night, be broken, in the name of Jesus.
43.    Every evil soul tie that is influencing me with the evil powers of the night, be broken, in the name of Jesus.
44.    Every door opened by the evil powers of the night, be closed, in the name of Jesus.
45.    I attack and destroy all areas of control held by the evil powers of the night, in the name of Jesus.
46.    Quencher of deliverance, die, in the name of Jesus.
47.    I cancel all plans and programs of the evil powers of the night, in the name of Jesus.
48.    I de-program every assignment of the evil powers of the night, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: PRAYER POINTS AGAINST LUCIFERIAN NIGHT PLANTERS
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Matthew 13
Confession - Isaiah 49:24-26
1.    Father, I thank You, for opening my understanding to behold wondrous things from Your law.
2.    Father, I thank You, for not allowing the enemies to devour my life.
3.    Bring quality repentance and grace unto the Lord.
4.    Any evil thing planted in my life, by the powers of darkness, come out now, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Thou powers of the darkness and night, release my virtues, in the name of Jesus.
6.    Every twin substitute in the spirit, stealing from my life or destiny, loose your hold, in the name of Jesus.
7.    Every satanic farmer operating in my life and targeting my life, I command you to fail and loose the power of existance, in the name of Jesus.
8.    O God arise, and let every power of the darkness and night working against my life or destiny scatter, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Every strength and cage of witchcraft, targeted against me, be dismantled, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Every habitation of humiliation and disgrace, fashioned against me, be shattered by the power of Almighty God.
11.    Every tree that the Father has not planted in my life, be uprooted and wither by fire, in the name of Jesus.
12.    O God arise, and give me the very best You can do for me, in the name of Jesus.
13.    My Father, make my life an amazement to my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
14.    My glory, reject evil substitute, exchange and transfer, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Thou power of evil spiritual marriage and strenght, die, in the name of Jesus.
16.    Every Goliath in my life, be wasted, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Let my name become hot coals of fire that cannot be summoned by any power of darkness, in Jesus name.
18.    My Father, move me from where I am to where You want me to be, in the name of Jesus.
19.    Every problem programmed into my life in the dream, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
20.    Anything I have eaten from the table of the devil, be vomited, in the name of Jesus.
21.    Holy Ghost fire, disconnect me from every arrow of darkness, in the name of Jesus.
22.    Every evil cycle affecting my life, break, in the name of Jesus.
23.    My Father, I shall not fail You, give me the grace to live for you, in the name of Jesus.
24.    I bind and cast out, every spirit of slumber and weakness, in the name of Jesus.
25.    I overthrow every altar of powerlessness and frustration, in the name of Jesus.
26.    I shall not sleep on my mountain of transfiguration, in the name of Jesus.
27.    I cancel every satanic negotiation over my health, anointing and destiny while I was asleep, in the name of Jesus.
28.    Every affliction of the night, my life is not your candidate, in the name of Jesus.
29.    I decree that sleep and slumber shall not have dominion over me, in the name of Jesus.
30.    Every assignment of the enemy to make me sleep when danger is near, be frustrated, in the name of Jesus.
31.    Earthquake of deliverance, arise every night, and pursue my pursuers, in the name of Jesus.
32.    I shall not be a victim of the terror of the night and the pestilence that walks in darkness, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: PRAYER POINTS AGAINST GREAT MOUNTAINS
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Acts 12
Confession - Zech. 4:6-7
 
1.    O Lord, I put myself in Your will and hands
2.    I promise to do what You want me to do, give the grace, in the name of Jesus.
3.    O Lord, I will make the decision You want me to make, but inspire, in Jesus name.
4.    Lord, like a potter in the hands of the clay, make what You want out of my life and make it manifest, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Take me, O Lord, and give me whatever shape You want and see to it that it comes to past.
6.    If You want, O Lord, break the clay of my life to pieces and start over again, to your own glory.
7.    Lord, give me a position that I will stand in your will and do with me whatever You want.
8.    Let it be done according to Your will in my life, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Let it be done according to Your word in my life, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Let divine patience and glory settle in my life, in the name of Jesus.
11.    Every power asking for my head in a charger, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
12.    By the power that killed Haman in place of Mordecai, let those who hate my existence be disgraced and be placed in the position they wished for me, in the name of Jesus.
13.    Agents of sorrow that are pursuing me, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Terminators and destroyers of my father’s house, influencing my life die, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Satanic libation, appeasement and sacrifices made for my sake, be rendered impotent and vanish, in the name of Jesus.
16.    Circle of confusion, frustration and tiredness break, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Thou city of confusion, frustration and tiredness in my life, be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
18.    Wherever my spirit has been locked up, break loose by fire, in the name of Jesus.
19.    I will not fail as salt of the earth, in the name of Jesus.
20.    Fire of God, roast all witchcraft bags holding my finances, in the name of Jesus.
21.    Evil blood and virtue-sucking forces, suck yourselves to death, in the name of Jesus.
22.    I dismantle every blockage in the dream, in the name of Jesus.
23.    Every satanic bank manager and administrator in my life, vanish forever, in the name of Jesus.
24.    I terminated the appointment of the spirit of backwardness and setbacks, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Spirit of spiritual slumber and weakness, I vanquish you by fire, out of my life, in the name of Jesus.
26.    Every wall of Jericho erected against my success, greatness and destiny be scattered, in the name of Jesus.
27.    Pharaoh of backwardness, I bury you today, in the name of Jesus.
28.    Every unrighteous swearing and pledges of my ancestors, be cancelled, in the name of Jesus.
29.    Every dark hand in my foundation, fighting my destiny, wither, in the name of Jesus.
30.    Anything stolen from my life or destiny in the womb, I recover you by fire, in the name of Jesus.
31.    Any power waiting for my day of honor or promotion to disgrace me, die, in the name of Jesus.
32.    Every power promoting captivity in my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
33.    Lord, visit me with unusual surprises, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: PRAYER POINTS AGAINST GRAVE YARD SPIRIT POWER AGAINST GRAVE YARD SPIRIT
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - 1 Cor. 15
Confession - Psalm 118:17 
1.    I bind and cast out every graveyard spirit and its foundation harassing my life, in the name of Jesus.
2.    Any soul-tie with any dead relative, break, in the name of Jesus.
3.    Every demonic rain and wind stirred up against me, die, in the name of Jesus.
4.    Every sickness released against me from the grave yard, scatter and be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Blood of Jesus, destroy every ritual made against me in the grave yard, in the name of Jesus.
6.    Voice of the Lord, thunder and fire, destroy every mystery of darkness working against me, in Jesus name.
7.    I destroy the association of witches and native doctors assigned against me, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Gates and doors of the grave assigned against me, be closed by the blood of Jesus.
9.    Any power calling my name from the gates of grave and pit of hell, die, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Every evil decree issued against my health, fiancé and destiny, be revoked by fire, in the name of Jesus.
11.    Every influence of hell and grave yard spirits over my life, break, in the name of Jesus.
12.    Every evil transmission from hell and the grave, clear away, in the name of Jesus.
13.    Voices from hell and the grave, be silenced, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Serpents and scorpions assigned against me from hell and the grave, die, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Every tongue raining incantations and destruction against me, dry up, in the name of Jesus.
16.    Let the sharp teeth and strength of the enemy turn against the enemy, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Powers whose work is to relocate me out of Gods position and office, I vanish you forever, in Jesus name.
18.    If I have left my place of blessings, O Lord, chase me back there, in the name of Jesus.
19.    If my blessings have left me, O Lord, chase them back to me, in the name of Jesus.
20.    Powers whose work is to chase away my blessing, die in Jesus name.
21.    O God that appeared unto Israel in the land of affliction, manifest Your power in my life, in the name of Jesus.
22.    Every power troubling my star, be troubled and die, in the name of Jesus.
23.    Altar of wickedness and power, be desolated by fire and die, in the name of Jesus.
24.    Rod of God’s anger, arise against the troublers of my health, glory and destiny, in the name of Jesus.
25.    All ancestral debt-collector forcing and enforcing me to pay for what I did not buy, die, in the name of Jesus.
26.    Network of witchcraft in my place of birth, scatter and be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
27.    Every power scheming to waste my life, receive the baptism of destruction, in the name of Jesus.
28.    With Your hammer of fire, O God, arise and break the jaw of the oppressor, in the name of Jesus.
29.    Every evil hand and power of the enemy upon my star, wither forever, in the name of Jesus.
30.    Angels of the living God, minister destruction and confusion unto them that obstruct my progress, in the name of Jesus.
31.    O dry bones of my greatness scattered in witchcraft valleys, gather and live, in the name of Jesus.
32.    My sleeping giant, arise and fulfill your God-given destiny, in the name of Jesus.
33.    Every generational and foundational altar speaking against my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
34.    Every attack against my health, greatness and destiny when I was a child, be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
35.    I cancel the effect of any evil hand that feed as a baby, in the name of Jesus.
36.    Every satanic investigation into my life and future, be dismantled and die, in the name of Jesus.
37.    O Lord, give me the achievements that will swallow my past failures, in the name of Jesus.
38.    Every satanic investment in my foundation and life, hurting and attacking me, scatter and be consumed by fire, in Jesus name.

fields.title: CRUSHING THE GRIP OF EVIL ANCESTRAL POWERS
fields.prayers:
PRAYER POINTS


PRAISE WORSHIP
 SCRIPTURE READING:    Psalm 106
 CONFESSION:         Col. 2:14-15
1.    I take authority over this year, in the name of Jesus.  
2.    I decree that all the elements of this year will cooperate with me.
3.    I decree that these elemental forces should refuse to cooperate with my enemies.
4.    I speak unto the sun, the moon and the stars. They must not smite me.
5.    I pull down every negative energy planning to operate against my life this year.  This is the year the Lord has made, I will rejoice and be glad in it.  
6.    I dismantle any power uttering incantations to capture this year.  
7.    I render such incantations and satanic prayer null and void.  
8.    I retrieve this year out of their hands, in the name of Jesus.  
9.    Spirits of favor, counsel, might and power, come upon me, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: LET GOD ANSWER BY THUNDER
fields.prayers:
This is a 7day personal prayer program preceding the Deliverance Ministration on Scripture Reading:    John 1,Num. 13:16-33
Confessions: Eph. 3:20,Numbers 14:8-9
Praise Worship
 PRAYER POINTS:
1.      Every enemy of my full scale laughter, be destroyed, in Jesus’ name.
2.      Anything planted in my life to frustrate my marital life, come out now, in the name of Jesus.
3.      Every wall between me and the visitation of God, be broken, in the name of Jesus.
4.      Let the counsel of God prosper in my life, in the name of Jesus.
5.      Every cobweb spirit attacking my marital life, be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
6.      I speak unto my umbilical gate to overthrow all negative parental spirits, in the name of Jesus.
7.      I break the yoke of the spirits having access to my reproductive gates, in the name of Jesus.
8.      All my hidden virtues, arise by fire and locate me, in Jesus’ name.
9.      I bring fire from the altar of the Lord upon every evil marriage, in the name of Jesus.
10.  I redeem myself by the blood of Jesus from every sex trap, in the name of Jesus.
11.  Every evil spiritual marriage, I bury you today, in Jesus’ name.
12.  Holy Ghost fire, burn to ashes every token of evil spiritual marriage, in the name of Jesus.
13.  My life will not follow any inherited evil marital pattern, in the name of Jesus.
14.  I break the chain of marital stagnancy, in the name of Jesus.
15.  Holy Ghost, arise with Your weapon of fire and give me my breakthroughs this year, in the name of Jesus.
16.  My God, You are God, my being alive is testifying that You are good, in Jesus’ name.
17.  Every spiritual marriage contesting for my physical marriage, die, in the name of Jesus.
18.  Let the angel of God wipe off my name from the book of marital stagnancy, in the name of Jesus.
19.  I overthrow every evil marital plan, in the name of Jesus.
20.  Nothing will hinder my breakthroughs in this special program therefore, I confess all my hidden and open sins unto You, O Lord. (Do this in true repentance.)           Forgive me and have mercy on me, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Blood of Jesus, silence every voice of past sins that the enemy is using to harass me.
22.  I refuse to accept defeat as my lot today. My problems and private enemies must bow by fire, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Who is the enemy that says I will not get married? Dry up and burn to ashes, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Holy Spirit of God, You are my helper, locate my God-chosen husband/wife and glue him/her to me by fire, in the name of Jesus.
25.  By the fire of the Holy Ghost, I break free from every witchcraft intimidation, in the name of Jesus.
26.  I will arise and shine! Any power that wants me to die before my time, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
27.  Every household Lion roaring to scare away my God’s chosen wife / husband, I break your jawbone, in the name of Jesus.
28.  Every spirit of man / woman I have ever jilted in my life, release me by the blood of Jesus.
29.  I refuse to fish in the ocean of wrong marriage, in the name of Jesus.
30.  Every satanic offer of partner who will later on amputate my life, I reject you and I call down the fire of God upon you and your evil magnet, in Jesus name.
31.  In this program I claim my breakthroughs by fire and I thank God by faith, in the name of Jesus

fields.title: BREAKING ANTI-MARRIAGE YOKE
fields.prayers:
PRAYER POINTS
 
PRAISE WORSHIP
SCRIPTURE READING: Isaiah 43:1-19
CONFESSIONS: Psalm 30:11
PRAYER POINTS
1.     Glorify God for His divine intervention in your matters.
2.     Confess all your sins to God in full repentance and ask for forgiveness and mercy.
3.     Finger of God, stir up holy rebellion and holy anger in me to pray to the point of my breakthroughs today, in the name of Jesus.
4.   “Grip your head with your two hands and pray aggressively like this” My head, be disconnected from evil, be connected to good, in Jesus' name.
5.     I ---------, (mention your name) reject bewitchment, in the name of Jesus.
6.     Every dream of ---------- (pick from the list below), I reject you and release myself from you, in the name of Jesus.
- backwardness
- eating in the dream
- flying like a bird
- getting into strange marriages
- swimming inside water
- driving a vehicle with punctured tires
- wearing a torn or dirty wedding garment
- sexual intercourse with spirit husband/wife
7.     Heavenly sponge, wash and clean my life from evil deposits, in Jesus' name.
8.     Axe of God, come upon every evil padlock-used to lock up my marriage, in the name of Jesus.
9.   Finger of God, disconnect me from every satanic agenda and connect me to divine agenda, in the name of Jesus.
10.  Evil powers of my father's house, release me, it is time for me to get married, in the name of Jesus.
11.  Finger of God, arrest and strangulate every spiritual dog backing to chase away my husband/wife, in the name of Jesus.
12.  Shout the blood of Jesus 21 times and sing “I have seen, seen the down fall of Satan, glory be to God,” etc.
13. Thank the Lord for not coming late to help you, because faithful is He who has promised for He will not tarry.

fields.title: TO ARREST UNPROFITABLE LATENESS IN MARRIAGE
fields.prayers:
PRAYER POINTS

For spinsters and bachelors who feel that obtaining the right partner is getting rather late.  The best way to arrest delay in marriage is to engage in constant wrestling bouts with the enemy and to call back all the benefits you would have gained if you had gotten married earlier.  God is waiting for you to fight it out with your enemy.
 No word of God shall lack power of fulfillment!  God's words are always backed by His authority and we know His words cannot return to Him void. We serve a God that cannot lie. His dreams, vision and words concerning our lives will surely come to pass.  God is the one that instituted marriage and He performed the first wedding ceremony in Genesis chapter 2.  God has a man for every woman and if you feel that you have lost God's perfect will for your life, don't forget that for every Vashti there is an Esther.
 Lateness in marriage can come as a result of collective captivity, manipulations of household wickedness, spirit husband/wife and other anti-marriage forces. “In His time God makes all things beautiful"(Ecclesiastes 3:11).  The God that makes all things beautiful, will step into your situation, break down every wall of parti¬tion between you and your God-ordained partner (Ephesians 2:14) and gather you together by His Spirit (Isaiah 34:16; Ephesians 2:13).  Our God is faithful! He never comes late.  He will hasten His words (concerning your marriage) to perform it. (Jeremiah 1:12).
 
CONFESSIONS
 Habakkuk 2:3 says, “For the vision is yet for an appointed time, but at the end it shall speak, and not lie: though it tarry, wait for it; because it will surely come, it will not tarry.”
 Isaiah 34:16 says, “Seek ye out of the book of the Lord, and read: no one of these shall fail, none shall want her mate: for my mouth it hath commanded, and his spirit it hath gathered them.
 Philip. 2:9-10 says, “Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name: [10] That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of things in heaven, and things in earth, and things under the earth;”
 Col. 2:13 says, “And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses;”
 Rev. 12:11 says, “And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.”
 Luke 1:37 says, “For with God nothing shall be impossible.”
 
 PRAISE WORSHIP
1.    Thank the Lord because your miracle has come.
2.      Ask the Lord to forgive you any sin that would hinder answers to your prayers.
3.    Lord, make known to me the secrets of my inner life. Help me Lord, to discover my real self.
4.    Help me Lord, to discover my real self.
5.    Let every imagination of the enemy against my marital life be rendered impotent, in the name of Jesus.
6.      I refuse to co-operate with any anti-marriage spells and curses, in thename of Jesus.
7.    I cancel every bewitchment fashioned against my settling down in marriage, in the name of Jesus.
8.      Let every force magnetizing the wrong people to me be paralyzed, in the name of Jesus.
9.    I break every covenant of marital failure and late marriage, in the name of Jesus.
10.  I cancel every spiritual wedding conducted consciously or uncon¬sciously on my behalf, in the name of Jesus.
11.  I remove the hand of household wickedness from my marital life, in the name of Jesus.
12.  Let every incantation, incisions, hexes and other spiritually harmful activities working against me, be completely neutralized, in the name of Jesus.
13.    I command all forces of evil manipulating, delaying or hindering marriage to be completely paralyzed, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Let all evil anti-marriage marks be removed, in Jesus' name.
15.    Lord, restore me to the perfect way in which You created me if I ha been altered.
16.    Father, let Your fire destroy every satanic weapon fashioned against my marriage, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Lord, expose all the schemes and plans of satan ever devised again me through any source and at any time.
18.    I forsake any personal sin that has given ground to the enemy, in the name of Jesus.
19.    I reclaim all the ground I have lost to the enemy, in Jesus' name.
20.    I apply the power in the name and blood of Jesus to my marital situation.
21.    I apply the blood of Jesus to remove all consequences of evil operations and oppression, in the name of Jesus.
22.    I break the binding effect of anything of evil ever put upon me from any source, in the name of Jesus.
23.    Let all the enemies of Jesus Christ operating against my life be ex-posed, in the name of Jesus.
24.    I sever myself from any satanic linkage and any strange power, in the name of Jesus.
25.    I remove the right of the enemy to afflict my plan to get married, in the name of Jesus.
26.    I break every bondage of inherited marital confusion, in the name of Jesus.
27.    I bind and plunder the goods of every strongman attached to my mar-riage, in the name of Jesus.
28.  Let the angels of the living God roll away the stone blocking my marital breakthrough in the name of Jesus.
29.  I remove my name from the book of seers of goodness without mani-festation, in the name of Jesus.
30.  Let God arise and let all the enemies of my marital breakthrough be scattered, in the name of Jesus.
31.  Let the fire of God melt away the stones hindering my marital bless¬ings, in the mighty name of Jesus.
32.  Let the cloud blocking the sunlight of my glory and breakthrough be dispersed, in the name of Jesus.
33.  Let all evil spirits masquerading to trouble my marital life be bound, inthe name of Jesus.
34.  The pregnancy of good things within me will not be aborted by any contrary power, in the name of Jesus.
35.  Lord, let wonderful changes begin to be my lot from this week.
36.  I reject every spirit of the tail in all areas of my life, in Jesus' name.
37.  I receive my right match in the name of Jesus.
38.  I stand against every spirit of discouragement, fear, worry and frustra¬tion, in the name of Jesus.
39.  Lord, turn away all that would jilt, disappoint or fail me.
40.  Thank God for the victory.

fields.title: DIVINE MARITAL PRESCRIPTION
fields.prayers:
Bible Reading : 2nd Kings 5:1-15
Confession: Jeremiah 46:27


    DAY ONE
1.   Praise worship.
2.   I reject every false vision, for my marriage in the name of Jesus.
3.   Father Lord, correct every negative impression about me in the heart of ----------- in the name of Jesus.
4.   Any power sponsoring divorce in my marriage receive death sentence in the mighty name of Jesus.
5.   Every river of bitterness about my life flowing in the heart of  ------------- dry to your source in name of Jesus.
6.   Every evil tree planted against my life dry to your root now in the name of Jesus.
7.   Any power hardening the heart of my partner, somersault and die now in the name of Jesus.
8.   I refuse to sit in any evil seat constructed for me by every enemy of my marriage in Jesus Name.
9.   My marriage will not be what the enemy wants it to be in the name of Jesus.
10. The name of Jesus shall not fail in my marital case in the name of Jesus.
11. When my miracle is coming, I will not annoy God in the name of Jesus.
12. I refuse faith-suffocating problems, in my marital case in the name of Jesus.
 
DAY TWO
 
13. I shall be victorious whether in the presence or absence of my enemy in the mighty name of Jesus.
14. Every trick and pain of the devil at the edge of my miracle shall not prosper over my life in the name of Jesus.
15. Whatsoever that will make me to fail God at the edge of miracle, in the name of Jesus fail woefully.
16. Every silent anti-marriage oppressor warring against the virtues and potentials in my marriage receive the destruction of God in Jesus name.
17. Whether the enemy likes it or not I shall regain my rightful position in my matrimonial home in the name of Jesus.
18. You stubborn problem that is troubling my marriage I command you to disappear now in the name of Jesus.
19. I disconnect my marriage from every evil connection in the name of Jesus.
20. Every evil desire, counseling, motivation and step that I have received from every enemy of my marriage, that is now working against my life, receive divine correction now in Jesus name.
21. I reject every satanic judgment over my marriage in the name of Jesus.
22. Father Lord, deliver my spirit and soul from every useless marital journey I have ever undertaken in the name of Jesus.
23. Every household power working against the fulfillment of the program of God for my marriage, be disgraced and be exposed in the mighty name of Jesus.
24. My marriage shall not be controlled by any strange woman in the name of Jesus.
25. I reject anything that will not glorify the name of God in my marriage in the name of Jesus.
 

 DAY THREE   
 26. I nullify the effect and activity of every information about me that my husband/wife had been fed with, in the name of Jesus.
27. O Lord, remember me for good during this program and open the book of remembrance for me concerning my marital case in the name of Jesus.
28. Every ungodly knowledge about my marital life be destroyed by the fire of God in the name of Jesus.
29. Every demonic research made about my life be smashed to pieces in the name Jesus.
30. Every demonic trap holding my marriage to ransom be destroyed beyond repair in Jesus name.
31. You vagabond spirit operating in the life of partner be bound forever in the name of Jesus.
32. I bind every spirit of marital fruitlessness in my life and in the life of my partner in the name of Jesus.
33. Lord, let the crown of marital success be placed in my head in the name of Jesus.
34. Lord, your divine prescriptions for my martial problems shall work for me in the name of Jesus.
35. I fire them back to sender, every arrow or martial shame targeted at me, in the name of Jesus.
36. Every demonic wall of partition between me and my husband/wife, be dashed to pieces in the name of Jesus.  
37. In this program, O Lord, let me receive you divine mercy and favor in the mighty name of Jesus.
38. Lord let this program be divine testimony program in Jesus Name.
39. Lord, among Your children that will give testimony for what you have done in their marriage during the prayer program I shall be number one in Jesus mighty name.
40. Begin to thank the Lord for answered prayers.

fields.title: POWER AGAINST EVIL PATTERNS
fields.prayers:

2.    You evil pattern of Marital Failure in my life, I destroy you, in the name of Jesus.
3.    O God of success, my marital life must not fail, in the name of Jesus.
4.    The failure that happened in the lives of my parents, will not happen in my life, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Every plantation of witchcraft in my family, what are you waiting for? Die, in the name of Jesus.
6.    Every pattern of household witchcraft in my family, I bury you today, in the name of Jesus.
7.    O God arise, and let every witchcraft power release my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Every stronghold of death and tragedy in my family, scatter by fire, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Every messenger of death operating in my family line, die in the name of Jesus.
10.    Every garment of evil pattern against my divine goal, roast, in the name of Jesus.
11.    Every evil pattern of non-achievement in my family clear out now, in the name of Jesus.
12.    Every giant of almost -there in my family, drop dead, in the name of Jesus.
13.    You evil pattern of poverty, die, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Every bacteria of poverty in my life, die in the name of Jesus.
15.    O Lord, let my life attract prosperity, in the name of Jesus.
16.    I command every pattern of Chronic disease in my life to cease, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Every evil pattern of infirmity in my life, break in the name of Jesus.
18.    I disconnect my life from all evil calendars in the name of Jesus.
19.    Every river of sadness, dry up by fire, in the name of Jesus.
20.    Crying shall not be my lot again, in the name of of Jesus.
21.    Every curse of disorder upon my family, be broken by fire, in the name of Jesus.
22.    O Lord, manifest your glory in my family, in the name of Jesus.
23.    Every pattern of failure in my root, die, in the name of Jesus.
24.    I wash away every deposit of failure, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Every evil pattern of marital failure in my life, break in the name of Jesus.
26.    Every evil pattern of unstable husband/wife in my life, break in the name of Jesus.
27.    You the spirit of lesbianism, I am not your candidate, in the name of Jesus.
28.    Lord, deliver me from every evil altar of Lesbianism, in the name of Jesus.
29.    Any area of my life that the spirit of lesbianism has gripped, break free by fire, in the name of Jesus
30.    I receive fire to destroy every sexual defilement in my life, in the name of Jesus. (Repeat Seven times)
31.    You stronghold of sexual impurity in my body, I pull you down, in the name of Jesus.
32.    I shake away every serpent of sexual immorality hiding in my life, in the name of Jesus.
33.    Every wall of Jericho of adultery in my life, I pull you down, in the mighty name of Jesus.
34.    Every satanic influence in my life, be quenched by fire, in the name of Jesus.
35.    Every anointing of destructive anger in my blood, dry up by fire, in the name of Jesus.
36.    O Lord, deliver me from the spirit of ancestral anger in the name of Jesus.
37.    You the satanic strongman of anger assigned to push me to hell, die, in the name of Jesus.
38.    Every evil pattern of Jezebel Spirit in my life, die by fire, in the name of Jesus.
39.    Every contract of evil pattern of Jezebel spirit in my family, terminated, in the name of Jesus.
40.    Every seed of depression in the salvation of my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
41.    O God my father, send down your fire, turn me to fire, on the mountain of fire, in the name of Jesus.
42.    You the root cause of bad habits, together with your branches, die, in the name of Jesus.
43.    Every ancestral spirit, responsible for bad habits in my life, be utterly destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
44.    O Lord, strengthen me for holy living pattern in the name of Jesus.
45.    O God, forgive me today, of every sin of unforgiveness in my family, in the name of Jesus.
46.    God arise, and help me to recover all my blessings that I have lost as a result of evil pattern, in the name of Jesus.
47.    I receive the power to overcome, in the name of Jesus
48.    Thank God for answers to your prayers.
49.    O Lord, repair every damage done to my life by evil pattern of argumentative spirit, in the name of Jesus.
50.    Every satanic attempt to downgrade my potentials with argumentative spirit, be frustrated now, in the name of Jesus.
51.    Every root of bitterness in my life, die, in the name of Jesus
52.    Blood of Jesus Christ, purge every bitterness away from my life, in the name of Jesus.
53.    Everything that bitterness has destroyed in my life, be restored by the resurrection power of God, in the name of Jesus.
54.    Every curse and pattern of careless indifference, affecting my destiny, break by fire, in the name of Jesus.
55.    The salt of my life shall not become sand, in the name of Jesus.
56.    Every evil word spoken in my home town against my family, backfire, in the name of Jesus.
57.    I shall reach my goal whatever anybody says about me, in the name of Jesus.
58.    Every power magnetizing me to the pattern of confusion, I bury you alive today, in the name of Jesus.
59.    You pattern of confusion turning me back at the edge of breakthroughs, enough is enough, die, in the name of Jesus.

63.    Any satanic agent that has ever lied against me, receive angelic slap; receive divine hammer and die, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: DESTROY THE SPIRIT OF FEAR
fields.prayers:
Praise Worship                                                                                   
Confession:
The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid? When the wicked, even mine enemies and my foes, came upon me to eat up my flesh, they stumbled and fell. Though a host should encamp against me, my heart shall not fear: though war should rise against me, in this will I be confident. (Psalm 27:1-3).

Make this power confession before you continue.
I announce that greater is the One that is in me than any devil on the side of my enemies. It is written, the righteous is as bold as a lion. By my faith in Christ Jesus, I am righteous. I receive my divine boldness. The angels of the Lord encamped round about them that fear Him. The angels of God are with me, I have no basis to fear any man, any evil, any evil spirit. Because the Lord of hosts is with me, I take my confidence in Him. It is written If God be for us who can be against us? God is with me, I have no enough reason to fear, in the name of Jesus. It is written, The Lord is my light and my salvation whom shall, I fear? The Lord is the defense of my life of whom shall I be afraid? Though a host of demons encamp against me, my heart will not fear; though war rises against me, even in this I shall be confident. The Lord is with me like a mighty terrible one. I am not afraid. I cannot be threatened. My persecutors shall stumble and fumble. Their everlasting confusion and disgrace shall never be forgotten. God has commanded me to fear not. Of the 366 days in a year, no single day is allowed for me to fear. So, I refuse to be afraid of anything. You spirit of fear, you are not in God's agenda for me. I dismiss you from my life now, in the name of Jesus. Jesus said even the very hairs of my head are not only counted but numbered. Not one single strand can be removed without God's knowledge and permission. Therefore, I put my confidence in the Lord, who takes so such care of me.


Prayer Points           
1.    In the name of Jesus, I refuse to fear, because God has not given me the spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.
2.    I bind the spirit of fear in my life, in the name of Jesus.
3.    I break every evil covenant that has brought fear into my life, in the name of Jesus.
4.    I command every terror of the night that has brought fear into my life to stop and move from my environment, in the name of Jesus.
5.    You spirit of fear, loose your hold upon my life and my family, in the name of Jesus.
6.    I command all human agents using the spirits of fear to terrify me in the night to stumble and fall, in the name of Jesus.
7.    The fear and terror of the unbelievers shall not be my lot, in the name of Jesus.
8.    My tomorrow is blessed is Christ Jesus, therefore, you spirit that is responsible for the fear of tomorrow in my life, I bind you, in the name of Jesus.
9.    My destiny is attached to God, therefore I decree that I can never fail, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Every bondage that I am subjecting myself to by the spirit of fear, I break you, in the name of Jesus.
11.    All negative doors that the spirit of fear has opened in the past, be closed now, in the name of Jesus.
12.    Every disease, oppression and depression that came into my life as a result of fear, disappear now, in the name of Jesus.
13.    I refuse to be intimidated by any demonic nightmare, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Every enchantment and invocation of fear being made against me, I neutralize you and I command you to fail, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Every confederacy of the enemies in my home with the enemies outside shall not stand, in the name o f Jesus.
16.    All arrangements of the devil concerning my home shall not stand; neither shall they come to pass, in the name of Jesus.
17.    I destroy all efforts of the enemy to frustrate my work, in the name of Jesus.
18.    I nullify every writing, agreement or covenant against my work, in the name of Jesus.
19.    Father Lord, increase my greatness and comfort me on every side, in the name of Jesus.
20.    O Lord, as You delight in my prosperity, I pray that You bless me indeed in my work. Let no household enemy be able to control my well-being any longer, in the name of Jesus.
21.    Let all those who are against me without a cause in my place of work turn back and be brought to confusion, in the name of Jesus.
22.    I close every door through which the enemies have been working against my work, in the name of Jesus.
23.    No weapon of satan and his agents fashioned against me shall prosper, in the name of Jesus.
24.    My life is hid with Christ in God, therefore nobody can kill me or harm me, in the name of Jesus.
25.    I open wide all doors leading to my blessings, victory and breakthroughs which the enemies have closed, in the name of Jesus.
26.    Let every territorial spirit working against us in our neighborhood be frustrated, bound and cast out, in the name of Jesus.
27.    Let every power contrary to the power of God operating to suppress people in my area be neutralized, in the name of Jesus.
28.    I bind every spirit of frustration, defeat, delayed blessing and fear in my environment, in the name of Jesus.
29.    I banish every enemy of progress in my neighborhood, in the name of Jesus.
30.    I bind the spirit of death, armed robbery and assassination in my neighborhood, in the name of Jesus.
31.    I reject, renounce and destroy every evil agreement or covenant in the environment, in the name of Jesus.
32.    By the blood of Jesus, I nullify the effects and operation of evil forces around my house, in the name of Jesus.
33.    Lord, get all my stubborn pursuers occupied with unprofitable assignments, in the name of Jesus.
34.    In Jesus' mighty name, I fire back every arrow, spiritual bullets and satanic missiles fired at me.
35.    O Lord, reveal the secrets and expose all my enemies masquerading as my friends.
36.    Father Lord, make it impossible for my enemies to use my foot marks, urine, faeces, hair, clothing, and shoes.

fields.title: POWER TO PROSPER
fields.prayers:

Praise Worship
Prayer Points
1.    Thank God for His provision so far.
2.    Let all security-men in charge of satanic banks that are harboring my blessings be paralyzed, in the name of Jesus.
3.    I terminate the appointment of all satanic bankers and managers, in the name of Jesus.
4.    I command the thunder of God to break to pieces all the satanic strong-rooms harboring my properties, in Jesus' name.
5.    I possess all my properties, in the name of Jesus.
6.    Let all satanic instruments (the legal tenders and the cheque) used against me be completely destroyed, in Jesus' name.
7.    I command all satanic clearing houses and agents to be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
8.    I paralyze completely all satanic transactions and contracts against my life, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Let all satanic network and computers fashioned against me be disorganized, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Heavenly Father, let all blood that has been stored up in satanic bank come forth, in the name of Jesus.
11.    I refuse to be an object for satanic transaction, in Jesus' name.
12.    I refuse to do profitless work, in the name of Jesus.
13.    Every evil force against my handiwork, be paralyzed, in the name of Jesus.
14.    I send back to the sender every arrow of spiritual deposit and advance payment against my handiwork, in the name of Jesus.
